languages.text: "Какой... подозрительно своевременный несчастный случай. Сервиторы вышли из строя на офицерской палубе как раз тогда, когда здесь присутствуют {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} и ее наследники". {n}Не сводя глаз с тел на полу, Кунрад снимает с пояса {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-передатчик{/g} и отрывисто отдает несколько команд в переговорное устройство. Затем он поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Я отдал команду блокировать переходы между верхним и средним сегментами обитаемых палуб. В случае намеренной атаки это должно помешать злоумышленникам... развить свой план".

traits.locale_text: "Какой... подозрительно своевременный несчастный случай. Дикая тварь освободилась на офицерской палубе как раз тогда, когда здесь присутствуют Вольный Торговец и ее наследники". {n}Не сводя глаз с мертвой бестии, Кунрад снимает с пояса вокс-передатчик и отрывисто отдает несколько команд в переговорное устройство. Затем он поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Я отдал команду блокировать переходы между верхним и средним сегментами обитаемых палуб. В случае намеренной атаки это должно помешать злоумышленникам... развить свой план".

languages.text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."
languages.original_text: "Какой... подозрительно своевременный несчастный случай. Сервиторы вышли из строя на офицерской палубе как раз тогда, когда здесь присутствуют {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} и ее наследники". {n}Не сводя глаз с тел на полу, Кунрад снимает с пояса {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-передатчик{/g} и отрывисто отдает несколько команд в переговорное устройство. Затем он поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Я отдал команду блокировать переходы между верхним и средним сегментами обитаемых палуб. В случае намеренной атаки это должно помешать злоумышленникам... развить свой план".

traits.locale_text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. A wild beast breaks free on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the dead beast, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. In the event that this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

"What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

languages.text: “这场事故发生的时机实在是太令人起疑了。机仆在军官甲板上发生了故障，而{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与她的继承人刚好就在这里。”{n}维特威尔目不转睛地看着地上的残躯，从腰带上取下了{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯器{/g}，快速说了几句命令，随后转向了你。{/n}“我已经封锁了上层甲板与下层甲板之间的所有通道。如果这是一场蓄谋已久的袭击，封锁甲板应该可以阻止那些敌人……实施他们的计划。”
languages.original_text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

traits.locale_text: “这场事故发生的时机实在是太令人起疑了。一头畜生在军官甲板上挣脱了束缚，而{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}与她的继承人刚好就在这里。”{n}维特威尔目不转睛地看着毙命的凶兽，从腰带上取下了{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯器{/g}，快速说了几句命令，随后转向了你。{/n}“我已经封锁了上层甲板与下层甲板之间的所有通道。如果这是一场蓄谋已久的袭击，封锁甲板应该可以阻止那些敌人……实施他们的计划。”

languages.text: «Un momento sospechosamente malo para tener un accidente así. Los servidores fallan en la cubierta de oficiales justo cuando la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y sus herederos se reúnen aquí». {n}Sin apartar la mirada de los cadáveres del suelo, Voigtvir saca el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco amplificador{/g} del cinturón y da unas órdenes rápidas a través del dispositivo. Después, se gira hacia ti.{/n} «He bloqueado todos los pasajes entre los sectores superiores e inferiores de las cubiertas residenciales. Si se trata de un ataque deliberado, eso debería evitar que los responsables... progresen con su plan».
languages.original_text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

traits.locale_text: «Un momento sospechosamente malo para tener un accidente así. Una bestia se libera en la cubierta de oficiales justo cuando la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y sus herederos se reúnen aquí». {n}Sin apartar la mirada del animal muerto, Voigtvir saca el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco amplificador{/g} del cinturón y da unas órdenes rápidas a través del dispositivo. Después, se gira hacia ti.{/n} «He bloqueado todos los pasajes entre los sectores superiores e inferiores de las cubiertas residenciales. Si se trata de un ataque deliberado, eso debería evitar que los responsables... progresen con su plan».

languages.text: 「このタイミングでこんな事故が起こるなど疑わしいほどだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}とその後継者がここに集まったと同時に、士官デッキのサーヴィターが故障した」{n}ボイトヴィルは床に落ちた数々の死体から目を離さず、ベルトから{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}を外し、装置に向かって簡単な命令を告げてから、あなたの方を向く。{/n}「住居デッキの上層部と下層部の間の通路をすべて封鎖した。これが意図的な攻撃であれば、犯人たちの計画の進行は…阻止されるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

traits.locale_text: 「このタイミングでこんな事故が起こるなど疑わしいほどだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}とその後継者がここに集まったと同時に、一頭の野獣が士官デッキから逃げ出した」 {n}ボイドヴィルは死んだ野獣から目を離さず、ベルトから{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}を外し、装置に向かって簡単な命令を告げてから、あなたの方を向く。{/n}「住居デッキの上層部と下層部の間の通路をすべて封鎖した。これが意図的な攻撃であれば、犯人たちの計画の進行は…阻止されるはずだ」

「このタイミングでこんな事故が起こるなど疑わしいほどだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}とその後継者がここに集まったと同時に、士官デッキのサーヴィターが故障した」{n}ボイトヴィルは床に落ちた数々の死体から目を離さず、ベルトから{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}を外し、装置に向かって簡単な命令を告げてから、あなたの方を向く。{/n}「住居デッキの上層部と下層部の間の通路をすべて封鎖した。これが意図的な攻撃であれば、犯人たちの計画の進行は…阻止されるはずだ」

languages.text: « Cet accident tombe vraiment à point nommé. Les servitors du pont des officiers se sont mis à flancher au moment même où la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} s'y est réunie avec ses héritiers. » {n}Sans quitter des yeux les cadavres gisant au sol, Voigtvir détache l'{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}émetteur vox{/g} de sa ceinture pour donner quelques ordres rapides dans l'appareil, puis il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'ai bloqué tous les passages entre les secteurs supérieurs et inférieurs des ponts résidentiels. Si cette attaque est délibérée, ses responsables devraient se retrouver... incapables d'avancer. »
languages.original_text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

traits.locale_text: « Cet accident tombe vraiment à point nommé. Une bête sauvage s'échappe sur le pont des officiers au moment même où la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} s'y est réunie avec ses héritiers. » {n}Sans quitter le cadavre de l'animal des yeux, Voigtvir détache l'{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}émetteur-vox{/g} de sa ceinture pour donner quelques ordres rapides dans l'appareil, puis il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'ai bloqué tous les passages entre les secteurs supérieurs et inférieurs des ponts résidentiels. Si cette attaque est délibérée, ses responsables devraient se retrouver... incapables d'avancer. »

languages.text: "Verdächtig schlechtes Timing für so einen Zwischenfall! Servitoren spielen ausgerechnet in dem Moment auf dem Offiziersdeck verrückt, als die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} und ihre Erben hier versammelt sind." {n}Ohne den Blick von den Leichen am Boden abzuwenden, nimmt Voigtvir den {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Transmitter{/g} von seinem Gürtel und spricht einige Befehle in das Gerät. Dann wendet er sich dir zu.{/n} "Ich habe alle Durchgänge zwischen den oberen und unteren Sektoren der Quartierdecks abgeriegelt. Falls es sich hier um einen geplanten Angriff handelt, sollten die Täter damit ... ihren Plan nicht fortsetzen können."
languages.original_text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

traits.locale_text: "Verdächtig schlechtes Timing für so einen Zwischenfall! Eine wilde Bestie reißt sich genau in dem Moment auf dem Offiziersdeck los, als die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} und ihre Erben hier versammelt sind." {n}Ohne den Blick von dem toten Tier zu wenden, nimmt Voigtvir den {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Transmitter{/g} von seinem Gürtel und spricht einige Befehle in das Gerät. Dann wendet er sich dir zu.{/n} "Ich habe alle Durchgänge zwischen den oberen und unteren Sektoren der Quartierdecks abgeriegelt. Falls es sich hier um einen geplanten Angriff handelt, sollten die Täter damit ... ihren Plan nicht fortsetzen können."

languages.text: "Böylesi bir kaza için şüphe uyandıracak derecede kötü bir tesadüf. Tam da {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ve vârisleri burada toplanmışken subay güvertesindeki hizmetörler arızaya geçiyor." {n}Voigtvir, gözlerini yerdeki cesetlerden ayırmadan kemerinden {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayar{/g} çıkarıyor ve aygıta hızla birkaç emir yağdırıyor. Ardından sana doğru dönüyor.{/n} "Yerleşim güvertelerinin yukarı ve aşağı sektörleri arasındaki tüm geçitleri kapattırdım. Bu kasti bir saldırıysa tertipleyenlerin planlarını bozacaktır."
languages.original_text: "What suspiciously poor timing for such an accident. Servitors malfunction on the officers' deck at exactly the same moment when the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and her heirs are gathered here." {n}Without taking his eyes off the bodies on the floor, Voigtvir removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} from his belt and speaks a few quick orders into the device. Then he turns to you.{/n} "I have blocked all passages between the upper and lower sectors of the residential decks. If this is a deliberate attack, it should stop the culprits from... advancing their plan."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi bir kaza için şüphe uyandıracak derecede kötü bir tesadüf. Tam da {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ve vârisleri burada toplanmışken subay güvertesindeki servitörler arızaya geçiyor." {n}Voigtvir, gözlerini yerdeki cesetlerden ayırmadan kemerinden {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayar{/g} çıkarıyor ve aygıta hızla birkaç emir yağdırıyor. Ardından sana doğru dönüyor.{/n} "Yerleşim güvertelerinin yukarı ve aşağı sektörleri arasındaki tüm geçitleri kapattırdım. Bu kasti bir saldırıysa tertipleyenlerin planlarını bozacaktır."
